description: The role segment contains the data necessary to add, update, correct, and delete from the record persons involved, as well as their functional involvement with the activity being transmitted

1.name: Role Instance ID
1.description: This field contains a unique identifier of the specific role record

2.name: Action Code
2.description: This field reveals the intent of the message. Refer to HL7 table 0287 - Action code for valid values
2.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

3.name: Role
3.description: This field indicates the functional involvement with the activity being transmitted (e.g., Case Manager, Evaluator, Transcriber, etc.).

4.name: Role Person
4.description: This field contains the identity of the person who is assuming the role that is being transmitted
4.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name

5.name: Role Begin Date/Time
5.description: This field contains the date/time when the role began

6.name: Role End Date/Time
6.description: This field contains the date/time when the role ended

7.name: Role Duration
7.description: This field contains the qualitative length of time for performance of a role (e.g., until the next assessment, four days, until discharge, etc.).

8.name: Role Action
8.description: This field indicates the reason why the person is assuming (or changing) the role (e.g., shift change, new primary nurse, etc.).
